data.actual_result: It closes the search menu with no visual indicators that it will.
data.expected_result: It should place a cursor in the search bar and let you edit your search query, do nothing or change the colour of the X button to indicate clicking there would cancel the search.
data.short_description: Clicking near the X button on the search bar but not on it still closes the search menu, the hitbox for it isn't accurate.
data.steps_to_repro: - Search for something. - Go close to the X button so that the cursor is near it but it hasn't changed colour to indicate that it's hovering over it. - Left click.
